36
37class CommunicationTags : public IndexGenerator<int> {
38
39friend class PatchKernel;
40
41public:
42 static CommunicationTags & instance();
43
44 int generate(MPI_Comm communicator);
45 bool isAssigned(id_type tag, MPI_Comm communicator);
46 void setAssigned(int tag, MPI_Comm communicator);
47 void trash(int tag, MPI_Comm communicator);
48
49 id_type getLatest() = delete;
50 id_type getHighest() = delete;
51
52 void reset() = delete;
53
54private:
55 static std::unique_ptr<CommunicationTags> m_instance;
56
57 CommunicationTags();
58
59 CommunicationTags(CommunicationTags const &other) = delete;
60 CommunicationTags& operator=(CommunicationTags const &other) = delete;
61
62};
